title: Pinjra
overview: The series is based on social and moral issues revolving around gender discrimination in the rural society, specifically related to the concept of Vani[5] The story tells the journey of Amtul Rafay, a young girl who is sold off by her family to compensate another family where her brother had killed her fianc√©. Simultaneously it revolves around reality based issues with different characters within the same plot.
